author: Maria Armental
title: Weight Watchers Looking to Expand Beyond Dieting
text:
Weight Watchers International Inc., coming off a turnaround plan that more than doubled profit for two-consecutive years, says it wants to be the global destination for wellness, a “partner in health and wellness.”
“The world doesn’t need another diet,” Chief Executive Mindy Grossman said Tuesday during a conference call with analysts. “Today, healthy is the new skinny.”
